mapper.update: update department set departmentName_t = #{departmentName},departmentInfo_t=#{departmentInfo} where departmentCode_t = #{departmentCode};
mapper.insert: insert into personnel(userCode_t, departmentCode_t, userRole_t, personnelCode_t) values (#{userCode},#{departmentCode},#{userRole},#{personnelCode});
mapper.select: select userCode_t as userCode,userRole_t as userRole from personnel where userCode_t=#{userCode} and departmentCode_t=#{departmentCode};

select departmentCode_t as department, departmentName_t as departmentName, departmentInfo_t as departmentInfo, departmentRoot_t as departmentRoot from department where 1=1
and departmentCode_t like "%"#{departmentCode}"%"
and departmentName_t like "%"#{departmentName}"%"
